string-array.name: description
string-array.item: I hope this decision will raise the collective consciousness needed to solve the water crisis," said Shaina NC, a top BJP leader in Maharashtra. She said the government is committed to delivering 25 lakh litres of water in the next seven days to drought-hit areas. "I hope corporates and others will help," she urged

I hope this decision will raise the collective consciousness needed to solve the water crisis," said Shaina NC, a top BJP leader in Maharashtra. She said the government is committed to delivering 25 lakh litres of water in the next seven days to drought-hit areas. "I hope corporates and others will help," she urged
